CVE-2012-1464.body: Netmechanica NetDecision Dashboard Server is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information; this may aid in further attacks. NetDecision 4.5.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-1465.title: NetDecision HTTP Server Stack-Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2012-1465.body: NetDecision is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Successful exploits of the buffer-overflow issue may lead to the execution of arbitrary code in the context of the application or to denial-of-service conditions. NetDecision 4.5.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-1465.title: NetDecision HTTP Server Long HTTP Request Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-1465.body: NetDecision HTTP Server is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users. NetDecision HTTP 4.5.1 is affected; other versions may also be vulnerable.

CVE-2012-1466.title: NetDecision Traffic Grapher Server Source Code Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2012-1466.body: NetDecision is prone to a source-code-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to view the source code of files in the context of the server process; this may aid in further attacks. NetDecision 4.5.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-1498.title: Webfolio CMS Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2012-1498.body: Webfolio CMS is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to add an administrator account or modify an existing and published web page. Webfolio CMS 1.1.4 and prior versions are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-1499.title: OpenJPEG '.jpeg' File Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2012-1499.body: OpenJPEG is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Successful exploits will result in the execution of arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition. OpenJPEG versions prior to 1.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-1503.title: Movable Type CVE-2012-1503 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-1503.body: Movable Type is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Movable Type 5.13 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-1506.title: OrangeHRM Multiple Cross Site Scripting and SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-1506.body: OrangeHRM is prone to an SQL-injection and multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities. Exploiting these vulnerabilities could allow an attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. OrangeHRM 2.7 RC is vulnerable; prior versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-1507.body: OrangeHRM is prone to an SQL-injection and multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities. CVE-2012-1515.body: Microsoft Windows and VMware ESXi and ESX are prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability related to BIOS ROM memory. CVE-2012-1521.body: Google Chrome is prone to multiple vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the browser, bypass security restrictions, other attacks may also be possible. Versions prior to Chrome 18.0.1025.168 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-1529.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user to view a specially crafted webpage. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions. Microsoft Internet Explorer versions 8 and 9 are affected.

CVE-2012-1557.body: Parallels Plesk Panel is prone to an unspecified remote security vulnerability that allows attackers to gain unauthorized administrative access to the application. CVE-2012-1558.body: CyaSSL is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to crash applications using the affected library, denying service to legitimate users. Versions prior to CyaSSL 2.0.8 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-1573.body: GnuTLS is prone to a heap-based memory-corruption vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2012-1575.body: Red Hat Enterprise MRG Management Console is prone to multiple cross-site-scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. CVE-2012-1576.body: Atheme IRC Services is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue will allow attackers to bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions.

CVE-2012-1578.body: MediaWiki is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability, a PRNG seed vulnerability, and multiple cross-site request-forgery vulnerabilities. CVE-2012-1584.body: taglib is prone to multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities because of a memory-corruption issue and an infinite loop. Attackers can exploit these issues to cause the application to crash, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2012-1588.title: Drupal Core CVE-2012-1588 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-1588.body: Drupal is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause an application to crash, denying service to legitimate users. Drupal versions 7.x through 7.12 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-1589.title: Drupal Core URI Redirection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-1589.body: Drupal is prone to an open-redirection vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can leverage this issue by constructing a crafted URI and enticing a user to follow it. When an unsuspecting victim follows the link, they may be redirected to an attacker-controlled site; this may aid in phishing attacks. Other attacks are possible. Drupal versions 7.x through 7.12 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-1590.title: Drupal Core Multiple Access Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-1590.body: Drupal is prone to multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks. Drupal versions 7.x through 7.12 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-1591.title: Drupal Core Multiple Access Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-1591.body: Drupal is prone to multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks. Drupal versions 7.x through 7.12 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-1594.body: Wireshark is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability because it fails to properly handle certain types of packets. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause the application to enter an infinite loop which may cause denial-of-service conditions. Wireshark 1.6.0 to 1.6.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-1595.title: Wireshark 'ERF' data Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-1595.body: Wireshark is prone a denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to crash the affected application, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. CVE-2012-1600.body: phpPgAdmin is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. CVE-2012-1606.body: TYPO3 is prone to multiple remote vulnerabilities, including information-disclosure, insecure unserializing, and cross-site scripting vulnerabilities. This may allow the attacker to compromise the application and the underlying system; other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2012-1615.body: Sectool is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges on systems running the affected application.

CVE-2012-1616.body: ICCLIB is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability because of a use-after-free error. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application. Successful exploits will compromise the application and possibly the underlying computer. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to ICCLIB 2.13 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-1617.body: OSClass is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability and an arbitrary-file-upload vulnerability. CVE-2012-1624.body: Lingotek module for Drupal is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability. PHP Address Book 6.2.12 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-1912.body: PHP Address Book is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. PHP Address Book 7.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

Attackers can exploit theses issues to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application, cause denial-of service conditions, retrieve potentially sensitive information, execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, and steal cookie-based authentication credentials. RealNetworks Helix Server 14.2.0.212 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

A successful exploit will result in the execution of arbitrary attacker-supplied code in the context of the user running the affected application. CVE-2012-2203.body: IBM Multiple Products are prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. CVE-2012-2267.title: RealNetworks Helix Server Multiple Remote Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-2267.body: RealNetworks Helix Server is prone to multiple remote vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit theses issues to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application, cause denial-of service conditions, retrieve potentially sensitive information, execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, and steal cookie-based authentication credentials. RealNetworks Helix Server 14.2.0.212 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-2268.title: RealNetworks Helix Server Multiple Remote Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-2268.body: RealNetworks Helix Server is prone to multiple remote vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit theses issues to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application, cause denial-of service conditions, retrieve potentially sensitive information, execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, and steal cookie-based authentication credentials. RealNetworks Helix Server 14.2.0.212 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-2269.title: ownCloud Multiple Input Validation Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-2269.body: ownCloud is prone to a URI open-redirection vulnerability, multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities and multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker could leverage the cross-site scripting issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Attacker-supplied HTML and script code would run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Successful exploits may redirect a user to a potentially malicious site; this may aid in phishing attacks. ownCloud 3.0.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-2297.title: Drupal Creative Commons Module Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2012-2297.body: The Creative Commons module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Creative Commons 6.x-1.x through versions prior to 6.x-1.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-2298.title: Drupal RealName Module Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2012-2298.body: The RealName module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. CVE-2012-2300.body: The Ubercart module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site-scripting vulnerability, a local information-disclosure vulnerability and a remote PHP-code-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary PHP code in the context of the webserver, obtain sensitive information, and steal cookie-based authentication credentials from legitimate users of the site. Other attacks are also possible. These vulnerabilities affect the following: Drupal Ubercart 6.x-2.x versions prior to 6.x-2.8 Drupal Ubercart 7.x-3.x versions prior to 7.x-3.1

CVE-2012-2313.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash a system, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2012-2314.body: Anaconda is prone to an insecure file-permission security issue that affects its bootloader configuration module. An attacker can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that can aid in further attacks.

CVE-2012-2315.body: OpenKM is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass the authentication process and gain unauthorized access to the affected system.OpenKM 5.1.7 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-2321.body: connman is prone to a remote command-injection vulnerability because it fails to adequately sanitize user-supplied input data. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary shell commands with the privileges of the user running the application.

CVE-2012-2322.body: connman is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers may leverage this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2012-2329.body: PHP is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform boundary checks before copying user-supplied data to insufficiently sized memory buffers. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary machine code in the context of the PHP process. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the webserver, denying service to legitimate users.

Serendipity 1.6 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

OpenOffice versions 3.3 and 3.4 Beta are vulnerable; prior versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-2448.body: VMware ESX is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code on the host operating system. Successful attacks may completely compromise the affected computer.

CVE-2012-2449.body: Multiple VMware products are prone to multiple privilege-escalation vulnerabilities. Local attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges or cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2012-2488.body: Cisco IOS XR Software is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug IDs CSCty94537 (ASR 9000) and CSCtz62593 (CRS).

CVE-2012-2566.body: Bloxx Web Filter is prone to the following issues: 1. A security bypass vulnerability. 2. Multiple cross-site request-forgery vulnerabilities. 3. Attackers can exploit these issues to run HTML or JavaScript code in the context of the affected application, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, to gain unauthorized access to the application, to bypass certain security restrictions or to disclose sensitive information; other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2012-2568.title: BlackArmor Network Administrator Password Reset Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-2568.body: BlackArmor is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability related to the password-reset feature. An attacker can exploit this issue to reset the application's administrator password and gain administrative privileges.

CVE-2012-2569.title: Xeams Email Server 'Body' Field HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-2569.body: Xeams Email Server is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. Attacker-supplied HTML or JavaScript code could run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible. Xeams Email Server 4.4 Build 5720 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-2570.title: X-Cart Gold 'symb' Parameter Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2012-2570.body: X-Cart Gold is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. X-Cart Gold 4.5 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-2572.title: Wordpress ThreeWP Email Reflector Plugin 'Subject' Field HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-2572.body: Wordpress ThreeWP Email Reflector Plugin is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Wordpress ThreeWP Email Reflector Plugin 1.13 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-2574.title: Symantec Web Gateway CVE-2012-2574 SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-2574.body: Symantec Web Gateway is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Symantec Web Gateway versions 5.0.x.x are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-2576.title: SolarWinds Storage Manager Server SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-2576.body: SolarWinds Storage Manager Server is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Storage Manager Server 5.1.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-2577.title: SolarWinds Orion Network Performance Monitor (NPM) Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-2577.body: SolarWinds Orion Network Performance Monitor (NPM) is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability and multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit the cross-site request-forgery issue to perform unauthorized actions in the context of a user's session. This may aid in other attacks. The attacker can exploit the HTML-injection issues to execute script code in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. SolarWinds Orion Network Performance Monitor (NPM) 10.2.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-2579.title: WordPress WP SimpleMail Plugin Multiple HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-2579.body: WP SimpleMail plugin for WordPress is prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. Attacker-supplied HTML or JavaScript code could run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible. WP SimpleMail 1.0.6 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-2580.title: Wordpress Postie Plugin 'From' Field HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-2580.body: Postie plugin for WordPress is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. Attacker-supplied HTML or JavaScript code could run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible. Postie 1.4.3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-2583.title: WordPress Mini Mail Dashboard Widget Plugin HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-2583.body: Mini Mail Dashboard Widget plugin for WordPress is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Attacker-supplied HTML and script code could be executed in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible. Mini Mail Dashboard Widget 1.42 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-2584.title: Alt-N MDaemon Body HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-2584.body: Alt-N MDaemon is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. Attacker-supplied HTML or JavaScript code could run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible. Alt-N MDaemon 12.5.4 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-2588.title: MailEnable Enterprise Multiple HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-2588.body: MailEnable Enterprise is prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sanitize user-supplied inputs. Attacker-supplied HTML or JavaScript code could run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible. MailEnable Enterprise 6.5 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-2591.title: EmailArchitect Email Server Multiple HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-2591.body: EmailArchitect Email Server is prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly validate user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to inject hostile HTML and script code that would run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. EmailArchitect Email Server 10.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-2592.title: Axigen Mail Server 'Body' Field HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-2592.body: Axigen Mail Server is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. Attacker-supplied HTML or JavaScript code could run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible. Axigen Mail Server 8.0.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-2601.title: Ipswitch WhatsUp Gold 'sGroupList' Parameter SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-2601.body: WhatsUp Gold is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. A successful exploit may allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. WhatsUp Gold 15.0.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-2602.title: SolarWinds Orion Network Performance Monitor (NPM) Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-2602.body: SolarWinds Orion Network Performance Monitor (NPM) is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability and multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit the cross-site request-forgery issue to perform unauthorized actions in the context of a user's session. This may aid in other attacks. The attacker can exploit the HTML-injection issues to execute script code in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. SolarWinds Orion Network Performance Monitor (NPM) 10.2.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-2625.title: Xen PyGrub Kernel Decompression Local Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-2625.body: Xen is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker with access to a guest operating system can exploit this issue to crash the host operating system, effectively denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2012-2645.title: Yahoo! Browser for Android 'WebView' Class Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2012-2645.body: Yahoo! Browser for Android is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information. This may aid in further attacks. Yahoo! Browser versions prior to 1.2.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-2657.title: unixODBC 'SQLDriverConnect()' 'FILEDSN' and 'DRIVER' Options Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-2657.body: unixODBC is prone to multiple buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied input before copying it to an insufficiently sized buffer. Successfully exploiting these issues may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial of service.

CVE-2012-2658.title: unixODBC 'SQLDriverConnect()' 'FILEDSN' and 'DRIVER' Options Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-2658.body: unixODBC is prone to multiple buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied input before copying it to an insufficiently sized buffer. Successfully exploiting these issues may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial of service.

CVE-2012-2662.title: Red Hat Certificate System Multiple Cross Site Scripting and Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-2662.body: Red Hat Certificate System is prone to the following security vulnerabilities: 1. Multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities. 2. A security-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting these issues may allow an attacker to bypass certain security restrictions, execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, and perform certain administrative actions in the vulnerable application.

CVE-2012-2665.title: LibreOffice and OpenOffice Multiple Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-2665.body: LibreOffice and OpenOffice are prone to multiple heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code on the affected device. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2012-2668.title: OpenLDAP Weak Cipher Encryption Security Weakness
CVE-2012-2668.body: OpenLDAP is prone to a security weakness when using the Mozilla NSS back-end. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow attackers to obtain sensitive information. This may lead to other attacks.

CVE-2012-2670.title: Collabtive 'manageuser.php' Arbitrary File Upload Vulnerability
CVE-2012-2670.body: Collabtive is prone to a vulnerability that lets an attacker upload and execute arbitrary script code in the context of the affected web server process. The issue occurs because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input.

CVE-2012-2673.title: Boehm GC malloc()' and 'calloc()' Multiple Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-2673.body: Boehm GC (libgc) is prone to multiple buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because it fails to properly bounds check user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code within the context of affected applications that are using the affected library. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2012-2679.title: Red Hat Network Configuration Client Insecure File Permissions Vulnerability
CVE-2012-2679.body: Red Hat Network Configuration Client is prone to an insecure file-permissions vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to obtain potentially sensitive information. Information obtained may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2012-2680.title: Cumin Multiple Remote Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-2680.body: Cumin is prone to the following multiple vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input: 1. Multiple information-disclosure issues (CVE-2012-2680) 2. A security-bypass issue (CVE-2012-2681) 3. Multiple cross-site scripting issues (CVE-2012-2683) 4. An SQL-injection vulnerability (CVE-2012-2684) 5. A denial-of-service issue (CVE-2012-2685) 6. A cross-site request forgery issue (CVE-2012-2734) 7. A session-fixation vulnerability (CVE-2012-2735) Exploiting these issues may allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, exploit vulnerabilities in the underlying database, execute HTML and script code in the context of the affected site, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, control how the site is rendered to the user, bypass security restrictions, or perform denial-of-service attacks. Other attacks are also possible. Note: Issues affecting Condor have been moved to BID 55632 for better documentation. The title and technical details have been changed accordingly.

CVE-2012-2686.title: OpenSSL CVE-2012-2686 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-2686.body: OpenSSL is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the application using the affected library, denying service to legitimate users. NOTE: The issue (described by CVE-2013-0166) has been moved to BID 60268 (OpenSSL CVE-2012-0166 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability) to better document it. OpenSSL versions 1.0.1c is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-2687.body: Apache HTTP Server is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability and an information disclosure vulnerability. Attackers may leverage these issues to obtain potentially sensitive session information, execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, or control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2012-2691.title: MantisBT SOAP API Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-2691.body: MantisBT is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability that may allow attackers to perform actions without proper authorization. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass security restrictions to obtain sensitive information or perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks. MantisBT versions prior to 1.2.11 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-2691.title: RETIRED: MantisBT SOAP API  CVE-2012-2691 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-2691.body: MantisBT is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability that may allow attackers to perform actions without proper authorization. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass security restrictions to obtain sensitive information or perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks. NOTE: This BID is being retired as a duplicate of BID 53907 (MantisBT SOAP API Security Bypass Vulnerability). MantisBT versions prior to 1.2.11 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-2692.body: MantisBT is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability that may allow attackers to perform actions without proper authorization. Multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities 3. An information-disclosure vulnerability An attacker can exploit these vulnerabilities to disclose sensitive information, gain elevated privileges, or bypass security restrictions. Other attacks are also possible. Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager versions prior to 3.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-2697.body: Red Hat autofs utility is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers may leverage this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2012-2705.body: Smart Breadcrumb is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. CVE-2012-2706.title: Drupal Post Affiliate Pro Cross Site Scripting and Access Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-2706.body: The Post Affiliate Pro module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability and a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit the cross-site scripting issue to execute arbitrary script code in the context of the vulnerable site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials. Attackers can exploit the security bypass issue to bypass security restrictions, obtain sensitive information, or perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2012-2707.title: Drupal Hostmaster Module Cross Site Scripting and Access Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-2707.body: The Hostmaster module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability and an access-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit the cross-site scripting issue to execute arbitrary script code in the context of the vulnerable site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials. Attackers can exploit the security bypass issue to bypass security restrictions, obtain sensitive information, or perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks. Hostmaster 6.x-1.x versions prior to 6.x-1.9 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-2708.title: Drupal Hostmaster Module Cross Site Scripting and Access Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-2708.body: The Hostmaster module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability and an access-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit the cross-site scripting issue to execute arbitrary script code in the context of the vulnerable site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials. Attackers can exploit the security bypass issue to bypass security restrictions, obtain sensitive information, or perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks. Hostmaster 6.x-1.x versions prior to 6.x-1.9 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-2710.title: Drupal Zen Theme Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2012-2710.body: The Zen theme for Drupal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Zen 6.x-1.x versions prior to 6.x-1.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-2711.title: Drupal Taxonomy List Module Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2012-2711.body: The Taxonomy List module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied text. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Taxonomy List 6.x-1.x through versions prior to 6.x-1.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-2712.title: Drupal Search API Module Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2012-2712.body: The Search API module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Search API 7.x-1.x through versions prior to 7.x-1.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-2713.title: Drupal BrowserID (Mozilla Persona) Module Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-2713.body: The BrowserID (Mozilla Persona) module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability and a security-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit these issues to bypass security restrictions to obtain sensitive information or to perform unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application; this may aid in launching further attacks. BrowserID (Mozilla Persona) 7.x-1.x versions prior to 7.x-1.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-2714.title: Drupal BrowserID (Mozilla Persona) Module Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-2714.body: The BrowserID (Mozilla Persona) module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability and a security-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit these issues to bypass security restrictions to obtain sensitive information or to perform unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application; this may aid in launching further attacks. BrowserID (Mozilla Persona) 7.x-1.x versions prior to 7.x-1.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-2715.title: Drupal Amadou Module Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2012-2715.body: The Amadou module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied text. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Amadou 6.x-1.x through versions prior to 6.x-1.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-2716.title: Drupal Comment Moderation Module Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2012-2716.body: The Comment Moderation module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. Comment Moderation 6.x-1.x through versions prior to 6.x-1.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-2717.title: Drupal Mobile Tools Module Multiple Unspecified HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-2717.body: The Mobile Tools module for Drupal is prone to multiple unspecified HTML-injection vulnerabilities because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. Attacker-supplied HTML and script code would run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Mobile Tools 6.x-2.x through versions prior to 6.x-2.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-2718.title: Drupal Counter Module SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-2718.body: The Counter module for Drupal is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2012-2720.title: Drupal Token Authentication Module Access Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-2720.body: Token Authentication module for Drupal is prone to an access bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and gain access to sensitive areas of application, thus perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks. Versions prior to Token Authentication 6.x-1.7 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-2721.title: Drupal Organic Groups Module Cross Site Scripting and Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-2721.body: The Organic Groups module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability and an security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit the cross-site scripting issue to execute arbitrary script code in the context of the vulnerable site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials. Attackers can exploit the security bypass issue to bypass security restrictions and obtain sensitive information, or perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks. Organic Groups 6.x-2.x versions prior to 6.x-2.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-2722.title: Drupal Node Embed Module Access Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-2722.body: The Node Embed module for Drupal is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and view node titles; this may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2012-2723.title: Drupal Maestro Module Cross Site Request Forgery and Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-2723.body: The Maestro module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability and a cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker can exploit the cross-site request-forgery issue to perform unauthorized actions in the context of a user's session. This may aid in other attacks. The attacker can exploit the cross-site scripting issue to execute arbitrary script code in the context of the vulnerable site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials. Other attacks are also possible. Versions prior to Maestro 7.x-1.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-2724.title: Drupal Simplenews Module Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2012-2724.body: The Simplenews module for Drupal is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks. The following versions are affected: Simplenews 6.x-1.x versions prior to 6.x-1.4 Simplenews 6.x-2.x versions prior to 6.x-2.0-alpha4 Simplenews 7.x-1.x versions prior to 7.x-1.0-rc1

CVE-2012-2727.title: Drupal Janrain Capture Module Open Redirection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-2727.body: Janrain Capture module for Drupal is prone to an open-redirection vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can leverage this issue by constructing a crafted URI and enticing a user to follow it. When an unsuspecting victim follows the link, they may be redirected to an attacker-controlled site; this may aid in phishing attacks. Other attacks are possible. CVE-2012-2734.body: Cumin is prone to the following multiple vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input: 1. Multiple information-disclosure issues (CVE-2012-2680) 2. A security-bypass issue (CVE-2012-2681) 3. Multiple cross-site scripting issues (CVE-2012-2683) 4. An SQL-injection vulnerability (CVE-2012-2684) 5. A denial-of-service issue (CVE-2012-2685) 6. A cross-site request forgery issue (CVE-2012-2734) 7. A session-fixation vulnerability (CVE-2012-2735) Exploiting these issues may allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, exploit vulnerabilities in the underlying database, execute HTML and script code in the context of the affected site, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, control how the site is rendered to the user, bypass security restrictions, or perform denial-of-service attacks. CVE-2012-2978.title: NSD NULL Pointer Dereference CVE-2012-2978 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-2978.body: NSD is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to trigger a NULL-pointer dereference error and cause a system crash, denying service to legitimate users. NSD versions prior to 3.2.12 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-2993.title: Microsoft Windows Phone 7 SSL Certificate 'Common Name' Validation Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-2993.body: Microsoft Windows Phone 7 is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability because the application fails to properly validate SSL certificates from a server. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to perform man-in-the-middle attacks or impersonate trusted servers, which will aid further attacks.

CVE-2012-2997.title: F5 Networks BIG-IP CVE-2012-2997 XML External Entity Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-2997.body: F5 Networks BIG-IP is prone to an XML External Entity injection vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain potentially sensitive information from local files on computers running the vulnerable application and to carry out other attacks.

CVE-2012-2999.title: Cerberus FTP Server CVE-2012-2999 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2012-2999.body: Cerberus FTP Server is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain administrative actions and gain unauthorized access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. Versions prior to Cerberus FTP Server 5.0.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-3000.title: F5 BIG-IP CVE-2012-3000 SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3000.body: F5 BIG-IP is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query. A successful exploit may allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Versions prior to F5 BIG-IP 11.2.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-3001.title: Mutiny CVE-2012-3001 Command Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3001.body: Mutiny is prone to a command-injection vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary commands with root privileges. Mutiny versions prior to 4.5-1.12 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-3002.title: Multiple Vendors IP Camera CVE-2012-3002 Remote Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3002.body: The IP camera product from multiple vendors is prone to a remote authentication-bypass vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow attackers to bypass certain security restrictions and gain unauthorized administrator access.

CVE-2012-3008.title: OSIsoft PI OPC DA Interface Remote Stack Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3008.body: The PI OPC DA Interface is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause the application to crash or execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. PI OPC DA Interface versions prior to 2.3.20.9 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-3035.title: Emerson DeltaV CVE-2012-3035 Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3035.body: Emerson DeltaV is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause a crash, denying service to legitimate users. Emerson DeltaV 9.3.1, 10.3.1, 11.3, and 11.3.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-3233.title: Kayako Fusion 'download.php' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3233.body: Kayako Fusion is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Kayako Fusion 4.40.1148 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-3236.title: GIMP 'fit' File Format Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3236.body: GIMP is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause the application to crash, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. GIMP 2.8.0 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-3293.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server Administration Console Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3293.body: IBM WebSphere Application Server is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary script code within the context of the application and steal cookie-based authentication credentials. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2012-3311.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server for z/OS Local Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3311.body: IBM WebSphere Application Server for z/OS is prone to a local security-bypass vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow local attackers to bypass certain security restrictions. Other attacks are also possible. IBM WebSphere Application Server for z/OS versions 7, 8, and 8.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-3319.title: IBM Rational Business Developer CVE-2012-3319 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3319.body: IBM Rational Business Developer is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. Versions of Rational Business Developer prior to 8.0.1.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-3325.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server Administrative Access Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3325.body: IBM WebSphere Application Server (WAS) is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and gain unauthorized administrative access to the affected application.

CVE-2012-3334.title: IBM Informix Dynamic Server CVE-2012-3334 Remote Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3334.body: IBM Informix Dynamic Server is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary-checks on user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected server. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. Informix IDS 11.50 and 11.70 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-3350.title: Webmatic 'Referer:' Field SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3350.body: Webmatic is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Webmatic 3.1.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-3355.title: Rhythmbox 'context' Plugin Insecure Temporary File Creation Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3355.body: Rhythmbox is prone to an insecure temporary file-creation vulnerability. An attacker with local access could potentially exploit this issue to perform symbolic-link attacks. Successfully mounting a symbolic attack may allow the attacker to delete or modify sensitive files. Other attacks may also be possible. Rhythmbox 0.13.3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-3356.title: ViewVC 'svn_ra.py' Authorization Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3356.body: ViewVC is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2012-3357.title: ViewVC 'svn_ra.py' Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3357.body: ViewVC is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2012-3358.title: OpenJPEG Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3358.body: OpenJPEG is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. OpenJPEG versions 1.4 and 1.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-3360.title: OpenStack Nova CVE-2012-3360 Remote Code Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3360.body: OpenStack Nova is prone to a remote code-injection vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to inject and execute arbitrary code with root privileges. Successful exploits will completely compromise affected computers.

CVE-2012-3361.title: OpenStack Nova CVE-2012-3361 Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3361.body: OpenStack Nova is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability. Attackers may exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service or gain elevated privileges.

CVE-2012-3365.title: PHP CVE-2012-3365 'open_basedir' Security-Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3365.body: PHP is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attackers to bypass certain security restrictions. Versions prior to PHP 5.3.15 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-3366.title: Bcfg2 'Trigger' Plugin Remote Command Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3366.body: Bcfg2 is prone to a remote command-injection vulnerability due to a failure to properly sanitize user-supplied input in the 'Trigger' plugin. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary commands within the context of the affected application. This may facilitate a complete system compromise.

CVE-2012-3367.title: Red Hat Certificate System Multiple Cross Site Scripting and Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-3367.body: Red Hat Certificate System is prone to the following security vulnerabilities: 1. Multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities. 2. A security-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting these issues may allow an attacker to bypass certain security restrictions, execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, and perform certain administrative actions in the vulnerable application.

CVE-2012-3369.title: JBoss Enterprise Application Platform CVE-2012-3369 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3369.body: The JBoss Enterprise Application Platform is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass authentication and gain access to other user accounts. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2012-3370.title: JBoss Enterprise Application Platform CVE-2012-3370 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3370.body: The JBoss Enterprise Application Platform is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass authentication and gain access to other user accounts. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2012-3371.title: OpenStack Compute (Nova) CVE-2012-3371 Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3371.body: OpenStack Compute (Nova) is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to cause the application to crash, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2012-3373.title: Apache Wicket CVE-2012-3373 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3373.body: Apache Wicket is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Apache Wicket 1.4.21 and 1.5.8 versions prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-3377.title: VLC Media Player 'OGG' File Remote Heap-Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3377.body: VLC media player is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Successful exploits can allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to VLC media player 2.0.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-3387.title: Moodle Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-3387.body: Moodle is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities, including: 1. Multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities2. A URI-redirection vulnerability3. An information-disclosure vulnerability4. A denial-of-service vulnerability5. An HTML-injection vulnerability 6. Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities7. Multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities8. An arbitrary file-upload vulnerability9. An arbitrary file-access vulnerability10. CVE-2012-3399.title: Basilic 'diff.php' Remote Command Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3399.body: Basilic is prone to a remote command-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary commands within the context of the vulnerable application. Basilic 1.5.14 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-3401.title: LibTIFF 't2p_read_tiff_init()' Function Heap-based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3401.body: The LibTIFF is prone to a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability. Successful exploits allow an attacker to execute arbitrary malicious code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the application. LibTIFF 4.0.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-3403.title: GIMP Multiple Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-3403.body: GIMP is prone to multiple buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because the application fails to bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2012-3410.title: GNU Bash Remote Stack Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3410.body: GNU Bash is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause the application to crash or execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application.

CVE-2012-3411.title: Dnsmasq Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3411.body: Dnsmasq is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions through a stream of spoofed DNS queries producing large results. Dnsmasq versions 2.62 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-3416.title: Condor CVE-2012-3416 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3416.body: Condor is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue allows an attacker to bypass host-based authentication and perform certain unauthorized actions in the context of the logged in users.

CVE-2012-3427.title: JBoss Enterprise Application Platform Insecure Directory Permissions Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3427.body: JBoss Enterprise Application Platform is prone to a security vulnerability because it sets insecure directory permissions. A local attacker can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information such as Amazon Web Services (AWS) credentials. This may aid in further attacks. JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 5 EL6 is affected; other versions may also be vulnerable.

CVE-2012-3429.title: Bind DynDB LDAP CVE-2012-3429 Package Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3429.body: Bind DynDB LDAP 'bind-dyndb-ldap' Package is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause the application to crash, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2012-3431.title: Teiid JDBC Man in the Middle Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3431.body: Teiid is prone to an information disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain the login credentials through a man-in-the-middle attack. Successful exploits will lead to other attacks.

CVE-2012-3432.title: Xen HVM Guest User Mode MMIO Emulation Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3432.body: Xen is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability when running in HVM guest user mode. An attacker can crash the guest guest operating system, effectively denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2012-3433.title: Xen CVE-2012-3433 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3433.body: Xen is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker with access to a guest operating system can exploit this issue to cause the host operating system unresponsive, effectively denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2012-3435.title: ZABBIX 'itemid' Parameter SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3435.body: ZABBIX is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability. A successful exploit may allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Versions prior to ZABBIX 2.0.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-3436.title: OpenTTD 'Water Clearing' Feature Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3436.body: OpenTTD is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue will allow remote attackers to crash the server, denying service to legitimate users. OpenTTD versions 0.6.0 through 1.2.1 are affected.

CVE-2012-3438.title: GraphicsMagick 'png_IM_malloc()' Function Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3438.body: GraphicsMagick is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploits will cause excessive memory consumption resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2012-3445.title: libvirt Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3445.body: libvirt is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue allow remote attackers to crash the application that uses the affected library, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2012-3447.title: OpenStack Nova CVE-2012-3447 Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3447.body: OpenStack Nova is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability. Attackers may exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service or gain elevated privileges. Note: This issue exists due to an incomplete fix for CVE-2012-3361 (identified in BID 54278 - OpenStack Nova CVE-2012-3361 Memory Corruption Vulnerability).

CVE-2012-3449.title: Debian 'openvswitch-pki' Package Multiple Insecure File Permissions Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-3449.body: openvswitch-pki is prone to multiple insecure file-permission vulnerabilities. A local attacker can exploit these issues to delete and replace the files with arbitrary data. This may aid in further attacks. openvswitch-pki 1.4.2+git20120612-7 is vulnerable; other versions may be vulnerable.

CVE-2012-3449.title: RETIRED: Open vSwitch CVE-2012-3449 Insecure Directory Permissions Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3449.body: Open vSwitch is prone to a security vulnerability because it sets insecure directory permissions. A local attacker can exploit this issue to modify, create, or delete files contained in affected directories. Open vSwitch 1.4.2 is affected; other versions may also be vulnerable. Note: This BID is being retired as a duplicate of BID 54789 (Debian 'openvswitch-pki' Package Multiple Insecure File Permissions Vulnerabilities).

CVE-2012-3455.title: Alligra Calligra Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3455.body: Calligra is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. Calligra 2.4.3 and KOffice 2.3.3 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-3459.title: Condor Multiple Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-3459.body: Condor is prone to multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities. Exploiting these issues may allow a remote attacker to bypass certain security restrictions and perform privileged actions in the context of the affected application. Condor versions prior to 7.8.4 are affected.

CVE-2012-3461.title: libotr2 Package Multiple Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-3461.body: libotr2 is prone to multiple heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2012-3467.title: Apache QPID NullAuthenticator Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3467.body: Apache QPID is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to bypass the authentication mechanism and gain unauthorized access.

CVE-2012-3478.title: rssh CVE-2012-3478 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3478.body: rssh is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Attackers may exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. rssh versions 2.3.3 and prior are vulnerable. http://drupal.org/node/207891

CVE-2012-3480.title: GNU glibc Multiple Local Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-3480.body: GNU glibc is prone to multiple stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Local attackers can exploit these issues to run arbitrary code with privileges of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts can result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2012-3481.title: GIMP Multiple Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities

CVE-2012-3488.body: PostgreSQL is prone to a vulnerability that allows attackers to write or overwrite arbitrary files on a vulnerable computer. An attacker can exploit this issue to create or overwrite arbitrary files on the computer running the affected application. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2012-3489.title: PostgreSQL 'xml_parse()' Function Arbitrary File Access Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3489.body: PostgreSQL is prone to an arbitrary file-access vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to read arbitrary files. This may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2012-3494.body: Xen is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker with access to a guest operating system can exploit this issue to crash the host operating system, effectively denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2012-3495.title: Xen 'physdev_get_free_pirq' CVE-2012-3495 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3495.body: Xen is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker with access to a guest operating system can exploit this issue to crash the host operating system, effectively denying service to legitimate users. Xen 4.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-3497.title: Xen 'TMEM hypercall' Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-3497.body: Xen is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to run arbitrary code within the context of the application, crash the affected application, deny service to legitimate users, and perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2012-3498.title: Xen 'PHYSDEVOP_map_pirq' Index CVE-2012-3498 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3498.body: Xen is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker with access to a HVM guest operating system can exploit this issue to crash the host operating system, effectively denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2012-3499.title: Apache  HTTP Server Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-3499.body: Apache HTTP Server is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary HTML and script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Apache HTTP Server versions prior to 2.4.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-3501.title: SquidClamav URL Parsing Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3501.body: SquidClamav is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause the daemon to crash, denying service to legitimate users. SquidClamav versions prior to 5.8 and 6.7 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-3503.title: Katello CVE-2012-3503 Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3503.body: Katello is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability. Attackers may exploit this issue to gain unauthorized access to user accounts or to bypass intended security restrictions. Other attacks may also be possible. http://drupal.org/node/207891

CVE-2012-3504.title: crypto-utils 'genkey' Script CVE-2012-3504 Insecure Temporary File Handling Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3504.body: crypto-utils is prone to a vulnerability regarding the handling of temporary files. Successful exploits may allow attackers to mount a symlink attack, which may allow the attacker to overwrite or corrupt sensitive files. This may result in a denial-of-service condition. Other attacks may also be possible.

CVE-2012-3509.title: GNU libiberty '_objalloc_alloc()' Function CVE-2012-3509 Remote Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3509.body: GNU libiberty is prone to a remote integer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly validate user-supplied input. Attackers can exploit this issue to run arbitrary code within the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts may crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2012-3510.title: Linux Kernel 'taskstats' Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3510.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to trigger a kernel panic or crash the system, denying service to legitimate users or causing a leak in the kernel memory.

CVE-2012-3512.title: Munin CVE-2012-3512 Insecure File Permissions Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3512.body: Munin is prone to an insecure file-permission. A local attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with root privileges. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2012-3515.title: Xen CVE-2012-3515 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3515.body: Xen is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Local attackers with access to a guest operating system can exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges on affected computers.

CVE-2012-3520.title: Linux Kernel Netlink Message Handling Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3520.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Successful attacks will allow attackers to bypass certain security restrictions and gain kernel-level privileges.

CVE-2012-3524.title: libdbus 'DBUS_SYSTEM_BUS_ADDRESS' Variable Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3524.body: libdbus is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. A local attacker may exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges.

CVE-2012-3525.title: jabberd XMPP Server Dialback Protection Bypass Component Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3525.body: jabberd is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions.

CVE-2012-3532.title: JBoss Enterprise Portal Platform GateIn Portal Multiple Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-3532.body: JBoss Enterprise Portal Platform is prone to multiple cross-site request-forgery vulnerabilities. Exploiting these issues may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. JBoss Enterprise Portal Platform 5.2.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-3533.title: oVirt SSL Certificate Validation Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3533.body: oVirt is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability because the application fails to properly validate SSL certificates received from the server. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to perform man-in-the-middle attacks or to impersonate trusted servers, which will aid in further attacks. oVirt 3.1 is vulnerable.

CVE-2012-3534.title: GNU Gatekeeper CVE-2012-3534 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3534.body: GNU Gatekeeper is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause the affected application to crash, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2012-3535.title: OpenJPEG Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3535.body: OpenJPEG is prone to a remote heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. OpenJPEG 1.5.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-3537.title: Dell 'Crowbar ohai' Plugin Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3537.body: The Crowbar ohai plugin is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability because it uses temporary files in an insecure manner. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges. Successful exploits will result in the complete compromise of affected computers.

CVE-2012-3540.title: OpenStack Dashboard (Horizon) CVE-2012-3540 Redirect Module Open Redirection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3540.body: The OpenStack Dashboard (Horizon) provides a baseline user interface for managing OpenStack services. OpenStack Dashboard Horizon is prone to an open-redirection vulnerability. An attacker can leverage this issue by constructing a crafted URI and enticing a user to follow it. When an unsuspecting victim follows the link, they may be redirected to an attacker-controlled site; this may aid in phishing attacks. Other attacks are possible.

CVE-2012-3542.title: OpenStack Keystone CVE-2012-3542 Unauthorized Access Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3542.body: Keystone is prone to an unauthorized-access vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to gain unauthorized access to the affected application. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2012-3543.title: Mono ASP.NET Web Form Hash Collision Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3543.body: Mono is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue by sending a small number of specially crafted ASP.NET form posts to an affected ASP.NET site. Successful exploits will attackers to disrupt the availability of sites that use the affected application.

CVE-2012-3544.title: Apache Tomcat CVE-2012-3544 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3544.body: Apache Tomcat is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers may leverage this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions. The following versions are vulnerable: Tomcat 7.0.0 through 7.0.29 Tomcat 6.0.0 through 6.0.36

CVE-2012-3546.title: Apache Tomcat CVE-2012-3546 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3546.body: Apache Tomcat is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attackers to bypass certain security restrictions, which may aid in further attacks. This issue affects Tomcat versions prior to 7.0.30 and 6.0.36.

CVE-2012-3547.title: FreeRADIUS Multiple Stack Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-3547.body: FreeRADIUS is prone to multiple stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because it fails to perform adequate boundary-checks on user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Successful exploits may compromise the application and the underlying computer. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2012-3551.title: Crowbar 'file' Parameter Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
