Note: The issue was previously covered in BID 55249 (Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird/SeaMonkey MFSA 2012-57 through -72 Multiple Vulnerabilities), but has been provided its own record to better document it. These issues are fixed in: Firefox 15 Firefox ESR 10.0.7 Thunderbird 15 Thunderbird ESR 10.0.7 SeaMonkey 2.12

CVE-2012-3969.title: Mozilla Firefox, SeaMonkey, and Thunderbird CVE-2012-3969 Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3969.body: Mozilla Firefox, SeaMonkey, and Thunderbird are prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running an affected application. Failed attempts may lead to a denial-of-service condition. This issue is fixed in: Firefox 15 Firefox ESR 10.0.7 Thunderbird 15 Thunderbird ESR 10.0.7 SeaMonkey 2.12 Note: This issue was previously discussed in BID 55249 (Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird/SeaMonkey MFSA 2012-57 through -72 Multiple Vulnerabilities) but has been moved to its own record to better document it.

CVE-2012-3970.title: Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird/SeaMonkey CVE-2012-3970 Use-After-Free Memory CorruptionVulnerability
CVE-2012-3970.body: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey are prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability due to a use-after-free condition. An attacker can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user to view malicious content. A successful exploit will result in the execution of arbitrary attacker-supplied code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. This issue is fixed in: Firefox 15 Firefox ESR 10.0.7 Thunderbird 15 Thunderbird ESR 10.0.7 SeaMonkey 2.12 Note: This issue was previously discussed in BID 55249 (Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird/SeaMonkey MFSA 2012-57 through -72 Multiple Vulnerabilities) but has been moved to its own record to better document it.

CVE-2012-3971.title: Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird/SeaMonkey CVE-2012-3971 Multiple Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-3971.body: Mozilla Firefox, SeaMonkey, and Thunderbird are prone to multiple memory-corruption vulnerabilities that may allow remote code execution. A successful exploit will result in the execution of arbitrary attacker-supplied code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. These issues are fixed in: Firefox 15 Thunderbird 15 SeaMonkey 2.12 Note: These issues were previously discussed in BID 55249 (Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird/SeaMonkey MFSA 2012-57 through -72 Multiple Vulnerabilities) but has been moved to its own record to better document it.

CVE-2012-3973.title: Mozilla Firefox CVE-2012-3973 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3973.body: Mozilla Firefox is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks. This issue is fixed in: Firefox 15 Note: This issue was previously discussed in BID 55249 (Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird/SeaMonkey MFSA 2012-57 through -72 Multiple Vulnerabilities) but has been moved to its own record to better document it.

CVE-2012-3974.title: Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird CVE-2012-3974 Local Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3974.body: Mozilla Firefox and Thunderbird are prone to a local code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application. Note: The issue was previously covered in BID 55249 (Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird/SeaMonkey MFSA 2012-57 through -72 Multiple Vulnerabilities), but has been provided its own record to better document it. These issues are fixed in: Firefox 15 Firefox ESR 10.0.7 Thunderbird 15 Thunderbird ESR 10.0.7

CVE-2012-3975.title: Mozilla Firefox/SeaMonkey/Thunderbird Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3975.body: Mozilla Firefox, SeaMonkey, and Thunderbird are prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to disclose sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. Note: The issue was previously covered in BID 55249 (Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird/SeaMonkey MFSA 2012-57 through -72 Multiple Vulnerabilities), but has been provided its own record to better document it. This issue is fixed in: Mozilla Firefox 15 Mozilla Thunderbird 15 Mozilla SeaMonkey 2.12

CVE-2012-3976.title: Mozilla Firefox/SeaMonkey CVE-2012-3976 Address Bar Spoofing Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3976.body: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey are prone to an address bar spoofing vulnerability. An attacker can then display spoofed site contents to the user that seemingly originate from the trusted site. This allows a remote attacker to carry out phishing attacks. Other attacks may be possible. Note: The issue was previously covered in BID 55249 (Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird/SeaMonkey MFSA 2012-57 through -72 Multiple Vulnerabilities), but has been provided its own record to better document it. This issue is fixed in: Firefox 15 Firefox ESR 10.0.7 SeaMonkey 2.12

CVE-2012-3978.title: Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird/SeaMonkey CVE-2012-3978 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3978.body: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey are prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks. This issue is fixed in: Firefox 15 Firefox ESR 10.0.7 Thunderbird 15 Thunderbird ESR 10.0.7 SeaMonkey 2.12

CVE-2012-3980.body: Mozilla Firefox and Thunderbird are prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Note: The issue was previously covered in BID 55249 (Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird/SeaMonkey MFSA 2012-57 through -72 Multiple Vulnerabilities), but has been provided its own record to better document it. CVE-2012-3986.body: Mozilla Firefox, SeaMonkey, and Thunderbird are prone to multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities. CVE-2012-3992.title: Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird/SeaMonkey CVE-2012-3992 Security Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3992.body: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird, and SeaMonkey are prone to a security vulnerability that occurs due to the spoofing of a location property. A successful exploit will result in injecting a script or intercepting posted data to a location specified with a relative path. Note: This issue was previously discussed in BID 55856 (Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird/SeaMonkey MFSA 2012-74 through -87 Multiple Vulnerabilities), but have been moved to their own record to better document it. This issue is fixed in: Firefox 16 Firefox ESR 10.0.8 Thunderbird 16 Thunderbird ESR 10.0.8 SeaMonkey 2.13

CVE-2012-3993.title: Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird/Seamonkey CVE-2012-3993 Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3993.body: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird and SeaMonkey are prone to an arbitrary code execution vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. Note: This issue was previously discussed in BID 55856 (Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird/SeaMonkey MFSA 2012-74 through -87 Multiple Vulnerabilities), but has been moved to its own record to better document it. This issue is fixed in: Firefox 16 Firefox ESR 10.0.8 Thunderbird 16 Thunderbird ESR 10.0.8 SeaMonkey 2.13

CVE-2012-3994.title: Mozilla Firefox/SeaMonkey/Thunderbird CVE-2012-3994 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3994.body: Mozilla Firefox, SeaMonkey, and Thunderbird are prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Note: This issue was previously discussed in BID 55856 (Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird/SeaMonkey MFSA 2012-74 through -87 Multiple Vulnerabilities), but has been moved to its own record to better document it. The issue is fixed in: Firefox 16 Firefox ESR 10.0.8 Thunderbird 16 Thunderbird ESR 10.0.8 SeaMonkey 2.13

CVE-2012-3995.title: Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird/SeaMonkey CVE-2012-3995 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2012-3995.body: Mozilla Firefox, SeaMonkey, and Thunderbird are prone to a remote-code-execution vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary machine code in the context of the vulnerable application; failed exploit attempts will likely crash the application. Note: This issue was previously discussed in BID 55856 (Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird/SeaMonkey MFSA 2012-74 through -87 Multiple Vulnerabilities), but has been moved to its own record to better document it. This issues are fixed in: Firefox 16 Firefox ESR 10.0.8 Thunderbird 16 Thunderbird ESR 10.0.8 SeaMonkey 2.13

CVE-2012-4000.title: FCKEditor 'spellchecker.php' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4000.body: FCKEditor is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. FCKEditor 2.6.7 is vulnerable; prior versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-4016.title: ATOK for Android CVE-2012-4016 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4016.body: ATOK for Android is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information. This may aid in further attacks. ATOK versions prior to 1.0.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-4020.title: MosP CVE-2012-4020 Access Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4020.body: MosP is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized access; this may aid in launching further attacks. Versions prior to MosP 4.1.0 are vulnerable. http://drupal.org/node/207891

CVE-2012-4021.title: MosP CVE-2012-4021 Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4021.body: MosP is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability. Attackers may exploit this issue to gain unauthorized access or to bypass intended security restrictions. Other attacks may also be possible. Versions prior to MosP 4.1.0 are vulnerable. http://drupal.org/node/207891

CVE-2012-4024.title: Squashfs Stack-Based and Heap-Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-4024.body: Squashfs is prone to stack-based buffer overflow and heap-based buffer overflow vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code or launch other attacks in the context of the application using the affected filesystem. Squashfs 4.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-4025.title: Squashfs Stack-Based and Heap-Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-4025.body: Squashfs is prone to stack-based buffer overflow and heap-based buffer overflow vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code or launch other attacks in the context of the application using the affected filesystem. Squashfs 4.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-4031.title: WANGKONGBAO CNS '/src/acloglogin.php' Directory Traversal Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-4031.body: WANGKONGBAO CNS 1000 and CNS 1100 are prone to multiple directory-traversal vulnerabilities because they fail to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Remote attackers can use specially crafted requests with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to retrieve arbitrary files in the context of the application. Exploiting these issues may allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information that could aid in further attacks.

CVE-2012-4032.title: WebsitePanel 'ReturnUrl' Parameter URI Redirection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4032.body: WebsitePanel is prone to a URI-redirection vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. A successful exploit may aid in phishing attacks; other attacks are possible. WebsitePanel versions prior to 1.2.2.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-4034.title: PBBoard Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-4034.body: PBBoard is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities including: 1. Multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities2. A security-bypass vulnerability3. An arbitrary file upload vulnerability Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to carry out unauthorized actions on the underlying database, to gain access to various user accounts by changing account passwords, or to execute arbitrary script code on an affected computer in the context of the affected application. PBBoard 2.1.4 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-4035.title: PBBoard Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-4035.body: PBBoard is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities including: 1. Multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities2. A security-bypass vulnerability3. An arbitrary file upload vulnerability Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to carry out unauthorized actions on the underlying database, to gain access to various user accounts by changing account passwords, or to execute arbitrary script code on an affected computer in the context of the affected application. PBBoard 2.1.4 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-4037.title: Transmission Multiple HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-4037.body: Transmission is prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input data. Exploiting these issues may allow an attacker to execute HTML and script code in the context of the affected site, to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, or to control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible. Transmission versions prior to 2.61 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-4054.title: CPE17 Autorun Killer Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4054.body: CPE17 Autorun Killer is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because the device fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions. CPE17 Autorun Killer 1.7.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-4055.title: Uiga FanClub 'p' Parameter SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4055.body: Uiga FanClub is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. A successful exploit may allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2012-4056.title: Uiga Personal Portal SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4056.body: Uiga Personal Portal is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. A successful exploit may allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2012-4057.title: Remote-Anything Player '.flm' File Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4057.body: Remote-Anything Player is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users. Remote-Anything Player 5.60.15 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-4060.title: XM Forum 'id' Parameter Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-4060.body: XM Forum is prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2012-4075.title: Cisco NX-OS CVE-2012-4075 Local Arbitrary Command Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4075.body: Cisco NX-OS is prone to a local arbitrary command-execution vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary shell commands on the underlying operating system with root privileges. This issue is being tracked by Cisco bug IDs CSCtf19827 and CSCtf27788.

CVE-2012-4076.title: Cisco NX-OS CVE-2012-4076 Local Arbitrary Command Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4076.body: Cisco NX-OS is prone to a local arbitrary command-execution vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary shell commands on the underlying operating system with administrative privileges. This issue is being tracked by Cisco bug IDs CSCtf23559 and CSCtf27780.

CVE-2012-4084.title: Cisco Unified Computing System CVE-2012-4084 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4084.body: Cisco Unified Computing System is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability because the application does not properly validate HTTP requests. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions in the context of the affected user. Other attacks are also possible. This issue is being tracked by Cisco bug ID CSCtg20755.

CVE-2012-4090.title: Cisco Nexus 7000 Series Switches NX-OS CVE-2012-4090 Remote Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4090.body: Cisco Nexus 7000 Series switches running on NX-OS are prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attackers to obtain sensitive information. This may result in further attacks. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCti09089.

CVE-2012-4091.title: Cisco NX-OS CVE-2012-4091 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4091.body: Cisco NX-OS is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to cause denial-of-service conditions. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCtj73415.

CVE-2012-4122.title: Cisco NX-OS CVE-2012-4122 Arbitrary File Creation or Overwrite Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4122.body: Cisco NX-OS is prone to a vulnerability that allows attackers to create or overwrite arbitrary files on a vulnerable device. An attacker can exploit this issue to create or overwrite arbitrary files on the affected device. This may aid in further attacks. This issue is being tracked by Cisco bug IDs CSCts56672 and CSCts56669.

CVE-2012-4141.title: Cisco NX-OS 'file name' Parameter Arbitrary File Write Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4141.body: Cisco NX-OS is prone to an arbitrary file-write vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to write arbitrary scripts to the file system on the device running the affected application. This may aid in further attacks. This issue is being tracked by Cisco bug IDs CSCua71557 and CSCua71551.

CVE-2012-4170.title: Adobe Photoshop CVE-2012-4170 Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4170.body: Adobe Photoshop is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary-checks on user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Successful exploits will compromise the affected application and possibly the underlying computer. Failed exploit attempts may cause a denial-of-service condition. Adobe Photoshop CS6 (13.0) is vulnerable.

CVE-2012-4178.title: Symantec Web Gateway 'deptUploads_data.php' SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4178.body: Symantec Web Gateway is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Symantec Web Gateway version 5.0.3.18 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-4251.title: MySQLDumper Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-4251.body: MySQLDumper is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities, including: 1. Multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities. 2. A local file-include vulnerability. 3. Multiple cross-site request-forgery vulnerabilities. 4. Multiple information-disclosure vulnerabilities. 5. A directory-traversal vulnerability. Exploiting these vulnerabilities may allow an attacker to harvest sensitive information, to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, perform unauthorized actions, to view and execute local files within the context of the webserver process and to retrieve arbitrary files in the context of the affected application. This may aid in launching further attacks. MySQLDumper 1.24.4 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

The following versions are vulnerable: Tomcat 7.0.0 through 7.0.31 Tomcat 6.0.0 through 6.0.35

CVE-2012-4432.title: OptiPNG Use-After-Free Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4432.body: OptiPNG is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attackers to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. OptiPNG versions 0.7 ,0.7.1 and 0.7.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-4433.title: GEGL CVE-2012-4433 Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4433.body: GEGL is prone to a remote integer-overflow vulnerability which leads to heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of a user running an application that uses the affected library. Failed exploit attempts may crash the application, denying service to legitimate users. GEGL 0.2.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-4437.title: Smarty 'SmartyException' Class Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4437.body: Smarty is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Smarty 3.1.11 is vulnerable; prior versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-4445.title: hostapd CVE-2012-4445 Message Handling Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4445.body: hostapd is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers may leverage this issue to crash the application, denying service to legitimate users. hostapd 0.6 through 1.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-4447.title: LibTIFF TIFF Image Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4447.body: LibTIFF is prone to a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability. Successful exploits allow an attacker to execute arbitrary malicious code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the application. LibTIFF 4.0.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-4450.title: 389 Directory Server Access Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4450.body: 389 Directory Server is prone to an access-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow attackers to bypass certain security restrictions and gain access to sensitive areas of application to perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2012-4451.title: Zend Framework Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-4451.body: Zend Framework is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Zend Framework versions prior to 2.0.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-4452.title: MySQL MyISAM Table Symbolic Link CVE-2012-4452 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4452.body: MySQL is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges on the affected computer.

CVE-2012-4454.title: openCryptoki Multiple Insecure File Creation Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-4454.body: openCryptoki is prone to multiple vulnerabilities because it creates certain files in an insecure manner. An attacker with local access could potentially exploit these issues to perform symbolic-link attacks with root privileges. Successfully mounting a symlink attack may allow the attacker to corrupt sensitive files in the context of root user. Other attacks may also be possible.

CVE-2012-4456.title: OpenStack Keystone Token Validation Multiple Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-4456.body: Keystone is prone to multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities. Successful exploits may allow authenticated attackers to bypass certain intended security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions which may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2012-4457.title: OpenStack Keystone Token Validation Multiple Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-4457.body: Keystone is prone to multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities. Successful exploits may allow authenticated attackers to bypass certain intended security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions which may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2012-4463.title: Midnight Commander 'MC_EXT_SELECTED' Variable Remote Security Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4463.body: Midnight Commander is prone to a security vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attackers to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the affected application.

CVE-2012-4465.title: cgit 'Author' Field Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4465.body: cgit is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2012-4467.title: Linux Kernel 'COMPAT_USE_64BIT_TIME' Multiple Local Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-4467.body: The Linux kernel is prone to multiple local denial-of-service vulnerabilities. Local attackers can exploit these issues to crash the affected computer, deny service to legitimate users, or read kernel memory.

CVE-2012-4468.title: Drupal Privatemsg Module Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4468.body: The Privatemsg module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied text. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Privatemsg 7.x-1.x through versions prior to 7.x-1.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-4470.title: Drupal Listhandler Module Access Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4470.body: The Listhandler module for Drupal is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized access; this may aid in launching further attacks. Listhandler 6.x-1.x versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-4471.title: Drupal Search Autocomplete Module Access Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4471.body: The Search Autocomplete module for Drupal is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized access; this may aid in launching further attacks. Search Autocomplete 7.x-2.x through versions prior to 7.x-2.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-4473.title: Drupal Restrict Node Page View Module Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4473.body: The Restrict node page view module for Drupal is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass security restrictions to obtain sensitive information; this may aid in launching further attacks. Versions prior to Restrict node page view 7.x-1.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-4474.title: Drupal Colorbox Node Module Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-4474.body: The Colorbox Node module for Drupal is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Colorbox Node 7.x-2.x versions prior to 7.x-2.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-4485.title: Drupal Gallery Formatter Module Unspecified HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4485.body: The Gallery formatter module for Drupal is prone to an unspecified HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Gallery formatter versions 7.x-1.x prior to 7.x-1.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-4489.title: Drupal Secure Login Module Open Redirection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4489.body: Secure Login module for Drupal is prone to an open-redirection vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can leverage this issue by constructing a crafted URI and enticing a user to follow it. When an unsuspecting victim follows the link, they may be redirected to an attacker-controlled site; this may aid in phishing attacks. Other attacks are possible. Secure Login versions 7.x-1.x prior to 7.x-1.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-4490.title: Drupal Excluded Users Module Multiple HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-4490.body: The Excluded Users module for Drupal is prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied text. An attacker can exploit the HTML-injection issues to execute arbitrary script code in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials. Other attacks are also possible. Excluded Users 6.x-1.x versions prior to 6.x-1.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-4491.title: Drupal Monthly Archive by Node Type Module Access Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4491.body: The Monthly Archive by Node Type module for Drupal is prone to an access-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow attackers to bypass certain security restrictions and gain access to sensitive areas of the application to perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2012-4492.title: Drupal Shorten URLs Module Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4492.body: The Shorten URLs module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied text. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Shorten URLs 6.x-1.x versions prior to 6.x-1.13 and 7.x-1.x versions prior to 7.x-1.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-4495.title: Drupal Mime Mail Module Access Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4495.body: Mime Mail module for Drupal is prone to an access-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and gain access to sensitive areas of the application to perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks. Mime Mail 6.x-1.x versions prior to 6.x-1.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-4496.title: Drupal Custom Publishing Options HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4496.body: Custom Publishing Options is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. Attacker-supplied HTML or JavaScript code could run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible. Custom Publishing Options versions prior to 6.x-1.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-4497.title: Drupal Elegant Theme Module HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4497.body: The Elegant Theme module for Drupal is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Elegant Theme 7.x-1.x versions prior to 7.x-1.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-4500.title: Drupal Announcements Module Access Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4500.body: The Announcements module for Drupal is prone to an access-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and gain access to sensitive areas of application to perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks. Announcements 6.x-1.x versions prior to 6.x-1.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-4504.title: libproxy CVE-2012-4504 Stack-Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4504.body: libproxy is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. Successfully exploiting this vulnerability can allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2012-4505.title: libproxy CVE-2012-4505 Heap-Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4505.body: libproxy is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. Successfully exploiting this vulnerability can allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2012-4506.title: Gitolite CVE-2012-4506 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4506.body: Gitolite is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to bypass certain security restrictions and execute arbitrary commands in the context of the application.

CVE-2012-4517.title: ibacm Denial of Service And Insecure File Permissions Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-4517.body: ibacm is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability and an insecure file-permission vulnerability. Successful exploit of these issues allows an attacker to overwrite certain files with arbitrary data or to crash the affected application denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2012-4523.title: radsecproxy Client Certificate Verification Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4523.body: radsecproxy is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attackers to bypass certain security restrictions. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2012-4524.title: xlockmore 'dclock' Mode Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4524.body: xlockmore is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker with local physical access can exploit this issue to gain unauthorized access to the system, which may lead to further attacks. xlockmore 5.0 through 5.40 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-4527.title: Mcrypt Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4527.body: Mcrypt is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. An attacker could exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. Mcrypt 2.6.8 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-4533.title: ViewVC CVE-2012-4533 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4533.body: ViewVC is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. Attacker-supplied HTML or JavaScript code could run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible. ViewVC 1.1.5-1.3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-4534.title: Apache Tomcat CVE-2012-4534 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4534.body: Apache Tomcat is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers may leverage this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions. The following versions are vulnerable: Tomcat 7.0.0 through 7.0.27 Tomcat 6.0.0 through 6.0.35

CVE-2012-4535.title: Xen Multiple Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-4535.body: Xen is prone to multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to cause the guest operating system to crash, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2012-4538.title: Xen Multiple Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-4538.body: Xen is prone to multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to cause the guest operating system to crash, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2012-4539.title: Xen Multiple Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-4539.body: Xen is prone to multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to cause the guest operating system to crash, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2012-4540.title: IcedTea-Web CVE-2012-4540 Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4540.body: IcedTea-Web is prone to a remote heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied input before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. Successful exploits allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable application. Failed exploit attempts likely result in denial-of-service conditions. The issue is fixed in the following versions: IcedTea-Web 1.1.7 IcedTea-Web 1.2.2 IcedTea-Web 1.3.1

CVE-2012-4540.title: IcedTea-Web CVE-2013-4349 Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4540.body: IcedTea-Web is prone to a remote heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied input before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. Successful exploits allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable application. Failed exploit attempts likely result in denial-of-service conditions. IcedTea-Web version 1.4 is vulnerable. Note: This issue is the result of a missing fix in IcedTea-Web version 1.4 for the vulnerability described in BID 56434 (IcedTea-Web CVE-2012-4540 Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability).

CVE-2012-4543.title: Red Hat Certificate System Multiple Cross-Site Scripting and Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-4543.body: Red Hat Certificate System is prone to multiple cross-site scripting and denial-of-service vulnerabilities. An attacker may leverage these issues to cause denial-of-service conditions or to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.

CVE-2012-4544.title: Xen PV Domain Builder Kernel Decompression Local Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4544.body: Xen is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker with access to a guest operating system can exploit this issue to crash the host operating system, effectively denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2012-4545.title: ELinks CVE-2012-4545 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4545.body: ELinks is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability that may allow attackers to perform actions without proper authorization. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass security restrictions to obtain sensitive information or perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2012-4547.title: AWStats 'awredir.pl' Unspecified Security Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4547.body: AWStats is prone to an unspecified security vulnerability. The impact of this issue is currently unknown. We will update this BID when more information emerges. Versions prior to AWStats 7.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-4551.title: libunity-webapps Use-After-Free Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4551.body: libunity-webapps is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability due to a use-after-free condition. An attacker can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user to view malicious content. A successful exploit will result in the execution of arbitrary attacker-supplied code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. This issue is fixed in libunity-webapps 2.3.3.

CVE-2012-4556.title: Red Hat Certificate System Multiple Cross-Site Scripting and Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-4556.body: Red Hat Certificate System is prone to multiple cross-site scripting and denial-of-service vulnerabilities. An attacker may leverage these issues to cause denial-of-service conditions or to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.

CVE-2012-4558.title: Apache  HTTP Server Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-4558.body: Apache HTTP Server is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary HTML and script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Apache HTTP Server versions prior to 2.4.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-4559.title: libssh Multiple Buffer Overflow and Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-4559.body: libssh is prone to the following security vulnerabilities: 1. Multiple buffer-overflow vulnerabilities 2. Multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities Remote attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application or cause denial-of-service conditions. libssh versions prior to 0.5.3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-4560.title: libssh Multiple Buffer Overflow and Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-4560.body: libssh is prone to the following security vulnerabilities: 1. Multiple buffer-overflow vulnerabilities 2. Multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities Remote attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application or cause denial-of-service conditions. libssh versions prior to 0.5.3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-4562.title: libssh Multiple Buffer Overflow and Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-4562.body: libssh is prone to the following security vulnerabilities: 1. Multiple buffer-overflow vulnerabilities 2. Multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities Remote attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application or cause denial-of-service conditions. libssh versions prior to 0.5.3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-4565.title: Linux Kernel 'tcp_illinois_info()' Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4565.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue cause the kernel to crash, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2012-4573.title: OpenStack Glance CVE-2012-4573 Arbitrary File Deletion Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4573.body: OpenStack Glance is prone to an arbitrary file-deletion vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to delete image files; this may aid in launching further attacks. http://drupal.org/node/207891

CVE-2012-4575.title: PgBouncer 'add_database()' Function Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4575.body: PgBouncer is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow attackers to shutdown the server, denying service to legitimate users. Versions prior to PgBouncer 1.5.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-4576.title: FreeBSD Linux Compatibility Layer Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerabiity
CVE-2012-4576.body: FreeBSD is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to overwrite portions of kernel memory, resulting in a privilege escalation or a system panic.

CVE-2012-4603.title: Citrix Receiver and Online Plug-in Unspecified Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4603.body: Citrix Receiver and Citrix Online Plug-in for Windows are prone to an unspecified arbitrary code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application. Successful exploits will compromise the application and possibly the underlying device. Citrix Receiver for Windows 3.2 and Citrix Online Plug-in for Windows 12.1; prior versions are also affected.

CVE-2012-4611.title: RSA Adaptive Authentication (On Premise) Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4611.body: RSA Adaptive Authentication (On Premise) is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2012-4614.title: EMC Smarts Network Configuration Manager (NCM) Multiple Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-4614.body: EMC Smarts Network Configuration Manager (NCM) is prone to multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities. Successfully exploiting these issues will allow attackers to bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. Smarts Network Configuration Manager (NCM) versions prior to 9.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-4615.title: EMC Smarts Network Configuration Manager (NCM) Multiple Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-4615.body: EMC Smarts Network Configuration Manager (NCM) is prone to multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities. Successfully exploiting these issues will allow attackers to bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. Smarts Network Configuration Manager (NCM) versions prior to 9.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-4617.title: Cisco IOS Malformed Attribute Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4617.body: Cisco IOS is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue will result in denial-of-service conditions. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug IDs CSCtt35379, CSCty58300, CSCtz63248, and CSCtz62914.

CVE-2012-4618.title: Cisco IOS NAT Functionality CVE-2012-4618 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4618.body: Cisco IOS is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploit of this issue could allow the attacker to cause the targeted device to reload, resulting in denial of service conditions. Note: To successfully exploit this issue the NAT SIP ALG feature should be enabled in the device. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCtn76183.

CVE-2012-4619.title: Cisco IOS NAT Functionality CVE-2012-4619 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4619.body: Cisco IOS is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploit of this issue could allow the attacker to cause the targeted device to reload, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCtr46123.

CVE-2012-4620.title: Cisco IOS Queue Wedge CVE-2012-4620 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4620.body: Cisco IOS is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to consume all available space in the affected interface queue, resulting in a queue wedge which may prevent new packets from being processed. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCts66808.

CVE-2012-4622.title: Cisco Catalyst 4500E Series Switch CVE-2012-4622 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4622.body: Cisco Catalyst 4500E Series Switch with Cisco Catalyst Supervisor Engine 7L-E is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue will result in denial-of-service conditions. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCty88456.

CVE-2012-4623.title: Cisco IOS DHCP Version 6 Server CVE-2012-4623 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4623.body: Cisco IOS is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause the affected device to reload, denying service to legitimate users. This issue is tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCto57723.

CVE-2012-4655.title: Cisco Secure Desktop CVE-2012-4655 Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4655.body: Cisco Secure Desktop is prone to a vulnerability that allow attackers to run an arbitrary executable. An attacker can exploit this issue by using social engineering techniques to coerce unsuspecting users to download and execute arbitrary applications. Successful exploits will allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the web browser. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in a denial-of-service condition. This issue is tracked by Cisco Bug IDs CSCtz76128 and CSCtz78204.

CVE-2012-4661.title: Multiple Cisco Products CVE-2012-4661 Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4661.body: Multiple Cisco products are prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCtr21359. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary command within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions. The following products are affected: Cisco Firewall Services Module (FWSM) Cisco ASA 5500 Series Adaptive Security Appliances Cisco Catalyst 6500 Series ASA Services Module

CVE-2012-4662.title: Multiple Cisco Products Multiple Remote Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-4662.body: Multiple Cisco products are prone to multiple remote denial-of-service vulnerabilities. These issues are being tracked by Cisco Bug IDs: CSCtr21346, CSCtr21376, CSCtr27521 and CSCtr27524. Successful exploit of these issues to cause the affected device to crash and reload, denying service to legitimate users. The following products are affected: Cisco Firewall Services Module (FWSM) Cisco ASA 5500 Series Adaptive Security Appliances Cisco Catalyst 6500 Series ASA Services Module

CVE-2012-4663.title: Multiple Cisco Products Multiple Remote Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-4663.body: Multiple Cisco products are prone to multiple remote denial-of-service vulnerabilities. These issues are being tracked by Cisco Bug IDs: CSCtr21346, CSCtr21376, CSCtr27521 and CSCtr27524. Successful exploit of these issues to cause the affected device to crash and reload, denying service to legitimate users. The following products are affected: Cisco Firewall Services Module (FWSM) Cisco ASA 5500 Series Adaptive Security Appliances Cisco Catalyst 6500 Series ASA Services Module

CVE-2012-4675.title: PluXml Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4675.body: PluXml is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. The attacker may leverage the cross-site scripting issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Versions prior to PluXml 5.1.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-4678.title: Munin Insecure Temporary File Creation Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4678.body: Munin is prone to a vulnerability because it creates temporary files in an insecure manner. An attacker with local access could potentially exploit this issue to perform symbolic-link attacks. Successfully mounting a symlink attack may allow the attacker to corrupt sensitive files or gain access to sensitive information. Other attacks may also be possible.

CVE-2012-4679.title: Sourcefabric Newscoop Multiple Cross Site Scripting and SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-4679.body: Sourcefabric Newscoop is prone to multiple cross-site scripting and SQL-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Sourcefabric Newscoop 3.5.4 is vulnerable; prior versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-4685.title: Arbor Networks Peakflow SP 'index/' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4685.body: Peakflow SP is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2012-4737.title: Asterisk CVE-2012-4737 Access Rule Remote Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4737.body: Asterisk is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass access control list (ACL) rules, which may lead to other attacks.

CVE-2012-4739.title: Barracuda SSL VPN Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-4739.body: Barracuda SSL VPN is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Barracuda SSL VPN 680 2.2.2.115 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-4740.title: PacketFence Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4740.body: PacketFence is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Versions prior to PacketFence 3.3.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-4743.title: Siche Search 'ssearch.php' Cross Site Scripting and SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-4743.body: Siche Search is prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities and a cross-site scripting vulnerability. Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Siche Search 0.5 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-4744.title: Siche Search 'ssearch.php' Cross Site Scripting and SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-4744.body: Siche Search is prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities and a cross-site scripting vulnerability. Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Siche Search 0.5 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-4745.title: Acuity CMS 'UserName' Parameter Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4745.body: Acuity CMS is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Acuity CMS 2.6.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-4750.title: Ezhometech EzServer AMF Request Remote Heap Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4750.body: Ezhometech EzServer is prone to a remote heap-based memory-corruption vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue will allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition. Ezhometech EzServer 7.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-4751.title: OTRS Email Body CVE-2012-4751 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4751.body: OTRS is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. The following versions are vulnerable: OTRS 2.4.x versions prior to 2.4.15 OTRS 3.0.x versions prior to 3.0.17 OTRS 3.1.x versions prior to 3.1.11

CVE-2012-4775.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer CTreeNode Use-After-Free Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4775.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user to view a specially crafted webpage. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions. Microsoft Internet Explorer 9 is affected.

CVE-2012-4776.title: Microsoft .NET Framework CVE-2012-4776 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4776.body: Microsoft .NET Framework is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the currently logged-in user. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2012-4777.title: Microsoft .NET Framework CVE-2012-4777 Remote Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4777.body: Microsoft .NET Framework is prone to a remote privilege-escalation vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges within the application and obtain unauthorized access to the sensitive information.

CVE-2012-4791.title: Microsoft Exchange Server RSS Feed Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4791.body: Microsoft Exchange Server is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attackers to cause the affected computer to become unresponsive, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2012-4833.title: IBM AIX CVE-2012-4833 Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4833.body: IBM AIX is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected computer, denying further service to legitimate users. IBM AIX versions 6.1, and 7.1 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-4841.title: IBM Tivoli Endpoint Manager for Remote Control CVE-2012-4841 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4841.body: IBM Tivoli Endpoint Manager for Remote Control is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to consume all CPU resources and effectively create denial-of-service conditions for legitimate users. IBM Tivoli Endpoint Manager for Remote Control 8.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-4845.title: IBM AIX FTP Client CVE-2012-4845 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4845.body: IBM AIX is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions such as getting access to root files; this may aid in launching further attacks. IBM AIX versions 6.1, and 7.1 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-4850.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server CVE-2012-4850 Remote Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4850.body: IBM WebSphere Application Server is prone to a remote privilege-escalation vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges within the application and obtain unauthorized access to the sensitive information. Versions prior to IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.5.0.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-4851.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server 'Liberty Profile' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4851.body: WebSphere Application Server is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Versions prior to WebSphere Application Server 8.5.0.1 are vulnerable

CVE-2012-4853.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server CVE-2012-4853 Cross-Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4853.body: IBM WebSphere Application Server is prone to a cross-site request forgery vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain actions in the context of an authorized user and gain access to the affected application; other attacks are also possible. IBM WebSphere Application Server versions prior to 8.5.0.1 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-4864.title: Oreans WinLicense Unspecified Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2012-4864.body: Oreans WinLicense is prone to an unspecified memory-corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the user running the affected application. Failed attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition. Oreans WinLicense 2.1.8.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-4869.title: FreePBX Multiple Cross Site Scripting and Remote Command Execution Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-4869.body: FreePBX is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities and a remote command-execution vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or execute arbitrary commands within the context of the affected application. FreePBX 2.9.0 and 2.10.0 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-4870.title: FreePBX Multiple Cross Site Scripting and Remote Command Execution Vulnerabilities
