This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.Limny 3.0.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-5346.title: WordPress WP Live.php 's' Parameter Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5346.body: WP Live.php plugin for WordPress is prone to a cross-site-scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2012-5348.title: MangosWeb Enhanced 'Login' field SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5348.body: MangosWeb Enhanced is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2012-5349.title: WordPress Pay With Tweet Plugin SQL Injection and Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-5349.body: The Pay With Tweet plugin for WordPress is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability and multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. Exploiting these vulnerabilities could allow an attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Pay With Tweet plugin 1.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-5350.title: WordPress Pay With Tweet Plugin SQL Injection and Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-5350.body: The Pay With Tweet plugin for WordPress is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability and multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. Exploiting these vulnerabilities could allow an attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Pay With Tweet plugin 1.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-5352.title: Java Open Single Sign-On Project Home (JOSSO) CVE-2012-5352 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5352.body: Java Open Single Sign-On Project Home (JOSSO) is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized access; this may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2012-5356.title: Ubuntu Software Properties PPA GPG Keys Validation Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5356.body: Ubuntu Software Properties is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker may exploit this issue to trick a user into installing arbitrary PPA GPG keys through man-in-the-middle attacks. This may allow the attacker to install malicious packages and execute arbitrary code on a vulnerable computer.

CVE-2012-5361.title: FFmpeg Multiple Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-5361.body: FFmpeg is prone to multiple remote code-execution vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2012-5367.title: OrangeHRM 'sortField' Parameter SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5367.body: OrangeHRM is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. OrangeHRM 2.7.1-rc.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-5368.title: phpMyAdmin CVE-2012-5368 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5368.body: phpMyAdmin is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability because the application fetches a piece of JavaScript in non-SSL mode. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to perform man-in-the-middle attacks or impersonate trusted servers, which will aid in further attacks. phpMyAdmin 3.5.x versions prior to 3.5.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-5371.title: Ruby CVE-2012-5371 Hash Collision Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5371.body: Ruby is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue by sending specially crafted forms in HTTP POST requests. Successful exploits will allow attackers to cause a denial-of-service condition. Versions prior to Ruby 1.9.3-p327 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-5373.title: Java CVE-2012-5373 'MurmurHash' Algorithm Hash Collision Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5373.body: Java is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability because it uses hash functions based on the 'MurmurHash' algorithm, which is vulnerable to predictable hash collisions. An attacker can exploit this issue by sending specially crafted sequence of strings to an affected application that uses these strings as keys to create a Hash object (like HTTP requests). Successful exploits will allow attackers to trigger a high CPU consumption that causes a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2012-5387.title: WordPress White Label CMS Plugin HTML Injection and Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-5387.body: White Label CMS plugin for WordPress is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability and a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Exploiting these issues may allow a remote attacker to perform certain administrative actions, gain unauthorized access to the affected application, execute arbitrary script or HTML code within the context of the browser, and steal cookie-based authentication credentials. Other attacks are also possible. White Label CMS 1.5 is vulnerable; prior versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-5388.title: WordPress White Label CMS Plugin HTML Injection and Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-5388.body: White Label CMS plugin for WordPress is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability and a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Exploiting these issues may allow a remote attacker to perform certain administrative actions, gain unauthorized access to the affected application, execute arbitrary script or HTML code within the context of the browser, and steal cookie-based authentication credentials. Other attacks are also possible. White Label CMS 1.5 is vulnerable; prior versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-5389.title: PowerTCP WebServer for ActiveX 'DartWebserver.dll' Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5389.body: PowerTCP WebServer for ActiveX is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability due to NULL-pointer dereference error. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the application (typically Internet Explorer), denying service to legitimate users. PowerTCP WebServer for ActiveX 1.9.2 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-5417.title: Cisco Prime Data Center Network Manager Remote Command Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5417.body: Cisco Prime Data Center Network Manager is prone to a remote command-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary commands within the context of the vulnerable application. This issue is tracked by Cisco Bug IDs CSCtz44924 and CSCua31204.

CVE-2012-5424.title: Cisco Secure Access Control System (ACS) CVE-2012-5424 Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5424.body: Cisco Secure Access Control System (ACS) is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability because it fails to properly validate user-supplied password when TACACS+ is the authentication protocol and Cisco Secure ACS is configured with a Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) external identity store. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCuc65634. An attacker can exploit this issue to impersonate a user and bypass the authentication to any system that uses TACACS+ protocol and relies on the authentication service provided by an affected Cisco Secure Access Control System.

CVE-2012-5452.title: Subrion CMS Multiple Cross Site Scripting and HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-5452.body: Subrion CMS is prone to an HTML-injection and multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Subrion CMS 2.2.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-5455.title: Joomla! 'language search' Component Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5455.body: Joomla! is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Joomla! versions prior to 3.0.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-5456.title: Zoner AntiVirus Free for Android X.509 Certificate Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5456.body: Zoner AntiVirus Free for Android is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability because of an error related to X.509 certificates. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to perform man-in-the-middle attacks and bypass certain security restrictions.

CVE-2012-5458.title: VMware Player and Workstation CVE-2012-5458 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5458.body: VMware Player and Workstation are prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability that occurs because of insecure process threads permissions. A local attacker can exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges on the target host operating system. VMware Workstation versions prior to 8.0.5 and VMware Player versions prior to 4.0.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-5468.title: bogofilter CVE-2012-5468 Heap Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5468.body: bogofilter is prone to a remote heap-memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. Bogofilter 1.2.2 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-5482.title: OpenStack Glance CVE-2012-4573 Arbitrary File Deletion Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5482.body: OpenStack Glance is prone to an arbitrary file-deletion vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to delete image files; this may aid in launching further attacks. http://drupal.org/node/207891

CVE-2012-5483.title: OpenStack Keystone CVE-2012-5483 Insecure File Permissions Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5483.body: Keystone is prone to an insecure file-permission vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to obtain potentially sensitive information, such as a secret key, that may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2012-5511.title: Xen Bitmap Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5511.body: Xen is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause the system to crash, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2012-5513.title: Xen 'XENMEM_exchange' Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5513.body: Xen is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges. Failed attacks will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2012-5516.title: Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-5516.body: Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities including: 1. A privilege-escalation vulnerability 2. Multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities 3. An information-disclosure vulnerability An attacker can exploit these vulnerabilities to disclose sensitive information, gain elevated privileges, or bypass security restrictions. Other attacks are also possible. Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager versions prior to 3.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-5519.title: CUPS CVE-2012-5519 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5519.body: CUPS (Common UNIX Printing System) is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. A local attacker can potentially exploit this issue to execute arbitrary commands with root privileges.

CVE-2012-5523.title: MantisBT Prior To 1.2.12 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-5523.body: MantisBT is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to obtain sensitive information or bypass certain security restrictions that may lead to further attacks. MantisBT versions prior to 1.2.12 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-5529.title: Firebird 'TraceDSQLPrepare::prepare()' Function NULL Pointer Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5529.body: Firebird is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability caused by a NULL-pointer dereference error. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the application, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. Firebird 2.5.0 and 2.5.1 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-5530.title: Performance Co-Pilot CVE-2012-5530 Multiple Insecure Temporary File Creation Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-5530.body: Performance Co-Pilot is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities because it creates temporary files in an insecure manner. An attacker with local access could potentially exploit these issues to perform symbolic-link attacks. Successfully mounting a symlink attack may allow the attacker to corrupt sensitive files or gain access to sensitive information. Other attacks may also be possible. Performance Co-Pilot 3.6.9 is vulnerable; prior versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-5533.title: lighttpd 'http_request_split_value()' Function Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5533.body: lighttpd is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow the attacker to cause the application to crash, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. lighttpd 1.4.31 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-5542.title: Drupal Commerce Extra Panes Module Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5542.body: The Commerce extra panes module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. Commerce extra panes 7.x-1.x versions prior to 7.x-1.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-5545.title: Drupal ShareThis Module Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5545.body: The ShareThis module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied text. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. ShareThis 7.x-2.x through versions prior to 7.x-2.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-5551.title: Drupal MailChimp Module Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-5551.body: The MailChimp module for Drupal is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. MailChimp 7.x-2.x through versions prior to 7.x-2.7 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-5552.title: Drupal Password Policy Module Password Hash Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5552.body: The Password Policy module for Drupal is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information through man-in-the-middle attacks that may lead to further attacks. The following versions are vulnerable: Password Policy 6.x-1.x versions prior to 6.x-1.5 are vulnerable. Password Policy 7.x-1.x versions prior to 7.x-1.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-5566.title: Multiple Horde Products Multiple Unspecified HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-5566.body: Multiple Horde products including Groupware Webmail Edition, Groupware, and Kronolith are prone to multiple unspecified HTML-injection vulnerabilities because they fail to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Attacker-supplied HTML and script code would execute in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible. The following versions are vulnerable: Groupware Webmail Edition versions prior to 4.0.9 Groupware versions prior to 4.0.9 Kronolith versions prior to 3.0.18

CVE-2012-5567.title: Multiple Horde Products Multiple Unspecified HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-5567.body: Multiple Horde products including Groupware Webmail Edition, Groupware, and Kronolith are prone to multiple unspecified HTML-injection vulnerabilities because they fail to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Attacker-supplied HTML and script code would execute in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible. CVE-2012-5574.title: Symfony CVE-2012-5574 Arbitrary File Access Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5574.body: Symfony is prone to an arbitrary file-access vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to read arbitrary files in the context of the web server process, which may aid in further attacks. Symfony versions prior to 1.4.20 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-5575.title: JBoss Enterprise Application Platform CVE-2012-5575 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5575.body: JBoss Enterprise Application Platform is prone to an information disclosure vulnerability that is related with XML encryption backwards compatibility. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to gain access to sensitive information that may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2012-5576.title: GIMP XWD File Handling Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5576.body: GIMP is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. GIMP 2.8.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-5580.title: libproxy 'print_proxies()' Function Format String Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5580.body: libproxy is prone to a format-string vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before passing it as a format specifier to a formatted-printing function. An attacker may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in a denial-of-service condition. libproxy 0.3.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-5581.title: LibTIFF 'DOTRANGE' Tags Handling Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5581.body: LibTIFF is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Successful exploits allow an attacker to execute arbitrary malicious code in the context of the application using the affected library. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the application. This issue is fixed in LibTIFF 4.0.2.

CVE-2012-5585.title: Drupal Mixpanel Module CVE-2012-5585 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5585.body: The Mixpanel module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied text. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Mixpanel 6.x-1.x versions prior to 6.x-1.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-5586.title: Drupal Services Module CVE-2012-5586 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5586.body: The Services module for Drupal is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks. Services 6.x-3.x versions prior to 6.x-3.3 and 7.x-3.x versions prior to 7.x-3.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-5590.title: Drupal Webmail Plus Module CVE-2012-5590 SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5590.body: The Webmail Plus module for Drupal is prone to an unspecified SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2012-5603.title: Red Hat CloudForms Multiple Insecure File Permissions and Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-5603.body: Red Hat CloudForms is prone to multiple insecure file-permission vulnerabilities and a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit these issues to obtain sensitive information such as administrative password, access and modify the files with arbitrary data, bypass certain security restrictions, and perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2012-5605.title: Red Hat CloudForms Multiple Insecure File Permissions and Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-5605.body: Red Hat CloudForms is prone to multiple insecure file-permission vulnerabilities and a security-bypass vulnerability. CVE-2012-5617.body: gksu-polkit is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with administrative privileges. Successful exploits will result in the complete compromise of affected computers.

CVE-2012-5621.body: Ekiga is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability because it fails to properly validate user-supplied input. Successful exploits will cause the affected application to crash, effectively denying service to legitimate users. Versions prior to Ekiga 4.0.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-5625.body: OpenStack Nova is prone to a local information-disclosure vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2012-5633.body: Apache CXF is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and gain unauthorized access; this may aid in launching further attacks. Versions prior to Apache CXF 2.7.3, 2.6.6, and 2.5.9 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-5641.title: MochiWeb CVE-2012-5641 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5641.body: MochiWeb is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information that could aid in further attacks.

CVE-2012-5646.body: Red Hat OpenShift Origin is prone to a remote command-execution vulnerability and an open-redirection vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Other attacks are possible.

CVE-2012-5647.body: Red Hat OpenShift Origin is prone to a remote command-execution vulnerability and an open-redirection vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. CVE-2012-5703.body: VMware ESXi and ESX are prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the server, triggering a denial-of-service condition. ESXi 4.1 and ESX 4.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-5756.title: IBM WebSphere DataPower XC10 Denial of Service and Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-5756.body: IBM WebSphere DataPower XC10 is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability, a security-bypass weakness, and a security-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit these issues to perform denial-of-service attacks, bypass certain security restrictions, man-in-the-middle attacks, or impersonate trusted servers; this will aid in further attacks. IBM WebSphere DataPower XC10 versions 2.0.0.0 through 2.0.0.3 and 2.1.0.0 through 2.1.0.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-5758.title: IBM WebSphere DataPower XC10 Denial of Service and Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-5758.body: IBM WebSphere DataPower XC10 is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability, a security-bypass weakness, and a security-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit these issues to perform denial-of-service attacks, bypass certain security restrictions, man-in-the-middle attacks, or impersonate trusted servers; this will aid in further attacks. IBM WebSphere DataPower XC10 versions 2.0.0.0 through 2.0.0.3 and 2.1.0.0 through 2.1.0.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-5759.body: IBM WebSphere DataPower XC10 is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability, a security-bypass weakness, and a security-bypass vulnerability. CVE-2012-5777.title: Empire CMS Template Parser Remote PHP Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5777.body: Empire CMS is prone to a remote PHP code-execution vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue to inject and execute arbitrary malicious PHP code in the context of the web server process. This may facilitate a compromise of the application and the underlying system; other attacks are also possible. Empire CMS 6.6 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-5784.title: Apache Axis and Axis2/Java SSL Certificate Validation Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5784.body: Apache Axis and Axis2/Java are prone to a security-bypass vulnerability because the application fails to properly validate SSL certificates from the server. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to perform man-in-the-middle attacks or impersonate trusted servers, which will aid in further attacks. The following versions are vulnerable: Apache Axis 1.4 Apache Axis2/Java 1.6.2

CVE-2012-5785.title: Apache Axis and Axis2/Java SSL Certificate Validation Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5785.body: Apache Axis and Axis2/Java are prone to a security-bypass vulnerability because the application fails to properly validate SSL certificates from the server. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to perform man-in-the-middle attacks or impersonate trusted servers, which will aid in further attacks. CVE-2012-5787.body: PayPal SDK is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability because the application fails to properly validate SSL certificates from the server. CVE-2012-5824.title: Trillian SSL Certificate Validation Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5824.body: Trillian is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability because the application fails to properly validate SSL certificates from a server. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to perform man-in-the-middle attacks or impersonate trusted servers, which will aid further attacks. Trillian 5.1.0.19 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-5828.title: BlackBerry PlayBook Unspecified Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5828.body: Blackberry Playbook is prone to an information disclosure vulnerability that affects the web browser component. An attacker can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user into viewing a specially crafted website. A successful exploit will result in the disclosure of potentially sensitive information. NOTE: Very limited information is currently available regarding this issue. We will update this BID as more information emerges.

CVE-2012-5829.title: Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird/SeaMonkey CVE-2012-5829 Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5829.body: Mozilla Firefox, SeaMonkey, and Thunderbird are prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. A successful exploit will result in the execution of arbitrary attacker-supplied code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. Note: This issue was previously discussed in BID 56607 (Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird/SeaMonkey MFSA 2012-91 through -106 Multiple Vulnerabilities), but has been moved to its own record to better document it. This issue was fixed in: Firefox 17.0 Firefox ESR 10.0.11 Thunderbird 17.0 Thunderbird ESR 10.0.11 SeaMonkey 2.14

CVE-2012-5858.body: Samsung Kies Air is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability and a security-bypass vulnerability. CVE-2012-5865.title: Achievo Cross Site Scripting and SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-5865.body: Achievo is prone to a cross-site-scripting vulnerability and an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Achievo 1.4.5 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-5879.title: McAfee Virtual Technician ActiveX Control 'Save()' Insecure Method Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5879.body: McAfee Virtual Technician ActiveX control is prone to a vulnerability caused by an insecure method. McAfee Virtual Technician 6.5.0.2101 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-5888.body: TYPO3 Basic SEO is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Basic SEO 0.8.1 is vulnerable; prior versions may be affected.

CVE-2012-5897.title: Quest InTrust 'ArDoc.dll' Multiple Insecure Method Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-5897.body: Quest InTrust is prone to multiple insecure-method vulnerabilities. Successfully exploiting this issue will allow attackers to create or overwrite files within the context of the affected application (typically Internet Explorer) that uses the ActiveX control. Attackers may be able to execute arbitrary code with user-level privileges. Quest InTrust 10.4.X is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-5901.title: PTK Cross Site Scripting and Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-5901.body: PTK is prone to cross-site scripting and information-disclosure vulnerabilities. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. The attacker may also obtain sensitive information.

CVE-2012-5902.title: PTK Cross Site Scripting and Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-5902.body: PTK is prone to cross-site scripting and information-disclosure vulnerabilities. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. The attacker may also obtain sensitive information.

CVE-2012-5903.title: Simple Machines Forum 'scheduled' Parameter Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5903.body: Simple Machines Forum is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Simple Machines Forum 2.0.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-5904.title: IrfanView Bitmap File Remote Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5904.body: IrfanView is prone to a remote heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because the software fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied input before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. Successful exploits allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable application. Failed exploit attempts likely result in denial-of-service conditions. IrfanView 4.32 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-5905.title: KnFTPd 'FEAT' Command Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5905.body: KnFTPd is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to crash the affected FTP server, denying service to legitimate users. KnFTPd 1.0.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-5906.title: GreenBrowser Cross Site Scripting and HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-5906.body: GreenBrowser is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability and an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker could leverage the cross-site scripting issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected page. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Attacker-supplied HTML and script code would run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the page is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2012-5907.title: TomatoCart 'json.php' Local File Include Vulnerability
CVE-2012-5907.body: TomatoCart is prone to a local file-include vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to obtain potentially sensitive information and to execute arbitrary local scripts in the context of the Web server process. This may allow the attacker to compromise the application and the computer; other attacks are also possible. TomatoCart 1.2.0 Alpha 2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-5908.title: MyBB 'index.php' SQL Injection and Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-5908.body: MyBB is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability and a cross-site scripting vulnerability. Exploiting these vulnerabilities could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary script code, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. MyBB 1.6.6 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-5909.title: MyBB 'index.php' SQL Injection and Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-5909.body: MyBB is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability and a cross-site scripting vulnerability. CVE-2012-5910.body: B2Evolution CMS is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability and multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input data. Exploiting these issues may allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, exploit vulnerabilities in the underlying database, execute HTML and script code in the context of the affected site, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, or control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible. B2Evolution CMS 4.1.3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-5911.body: B2Evolution CMS is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability and multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input data. CVE-2012-5912.body: PicoPublisher is prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. PicoPublisher 2.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-5913.body: WordPress Integrator is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. CVE-2012-5914.body: Seditio is prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will result in the execution of arbitrary attacker-supplied HTML and script code in the context of the affected application, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the page is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Seditio 161 is vulnerable; others may also be affected.

CVE-2012-5917.body: SnackAmp is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause an affected application to crash, denying service to legitimate users. SnackAmp 3.1.3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-5920.body: The Google Web Toolkit is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit these issues to run arbitrary code within the context of the application, crash the affected application, deny service to legitimate users, and perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2012-6038.title: razorCMS File and Directory Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2012-6038.body: razorCMS is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can gain unauthorized access to files and directories. Successful exploits may lead to other attacks. razorCMS 1.2 STABLE is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-6040.title: Advanced File Management 'users.php' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2012-6040.body: Advanced File Management is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Advanced File Management 1.4 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-6041.title: GreenBrowser Search Bar Short Cut Button Double Free Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2012-6041.body: GreenBrowser is prone to a remote use-after-free memory-corruption vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions. GreenBrowser 6.0.1002 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-6043.title: PHP-Fusion 'downloads.php' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2012-6043.body: PHP-Fusion is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. PHP-Fusion 7.02.04 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-6044.title: M-Player '.mp3' File Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-6044.body: M-Player is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users. M-Player 0.4 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-6045.title: Ramui Forum Script 'query' Parameter Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2012-6045.body: Ramui Forum Script is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2012-6046.title: PHP Enter 'banners.php' PHP Code Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-6046.body: PHP Enter is prone to a remote PHP code-injection vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to inject and execute arbitrary PHP code in the context of the affected application. This may facilitate a compromise of the application and the underlying system; other attacks are also possible. PHP Enter 4.1.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-6069.title: CoDeSys CVE-2012-6069 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2012-6069.body: CoDeSys is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information that could aid in further attacks.

CVE-2012-6080.title: MoinMoin wiki CVE-2012-6080 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2012-6080.body: MoinMoin wiki is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability. A remote attacker could exploit the vulnerability using directory-traversal characters ('../') to access arbitrary files that contain sensitive information. MoinMoin wiki versions 1.9.3 through 1.9.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-6085.title: GnuPG CVE-2012-6085 Multiple Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities
CVE-2012-6085.body: GnuPG is prone to multiple remote memory-corruption vulnerabilities because it fails to validate public keys. An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application and to corrupt the database. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to GnuPG 1.4.13 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-6091.title: Magento 'Zend_XmlRpc' Class Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2012-6091.body: Magento is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Successful exploit of this issue allows an attacker to gain access to certain local files. Information obtained may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2012-6096.title: Nagios Core 'get_history()' Function Stack Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2012-6096.body: Nagios Core is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. An attacker could exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. Nagios Core 3.4.3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2012-6107.body: Apache Axis2/C is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability because the application fails to properly validate SSL certificates from the server. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to perform man-in-the-middle attacks or impersonate trusted servers, which will aid in further attacks.

CVE-2012-6128.body: OpenConnect is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds check the user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. CVE-2012-6682.body: vBDownloads module for vBulletin is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. Attacker-supplied HTML or script code could run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2012-6692.title: WordPress SEO by Yoast Plugin 'post-new.php' script HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2012-6692.body: WordPress SEO by Yoast plugin for WordPress is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. WordPress SEO by Yoast 2.1.1 and prior are vulnerable

CVE-2012-6702.title: Libexpat Expat CVE-2012-6702 Predictable Random Number Generator Weakness
CVE-2012-6702.body: Libexpat Expat is prone to a predictable random number generator weakness. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information and perform certain unauthorized actions; this may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2012-6704.title: Linux Kernel CVE-2012-6704 Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2012-6704.body: Linux Kernel is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to crash the application, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. Linux kernel versions prior to 3.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-6708.title: JQuery CVE-2012-6708 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2012-6708.body: JQuery is prone to a cross-site-scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Versions prior to JQuery 1.9.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2012-6711.title: GNU Bash CVE-2012-6711 Local Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2012-6711.body: GNU Bash is prone to a local heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary-checks on user supplied data. An attacker may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.
